(\{ "visitors", "\\
\\r\\n\
As of this day we currently aid the following houses and or guilds with their flowers.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n--\
\\r\\nThe Great House Avoirdupois \
\\r\\nThe Great House Bisclavret\
\\r\\nThe Gardener's Guild (Master Fips)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nIf you wish our aid feel free to write Trinity or Finn.\
\\r\\n\
\\\r\\n" \})

(\{ "visitors", "\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\

\\r\\n\
\Who We Are\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
~ Everyone is a rose, bold and beautiful. ~\\
\\r\\n\We're a healing and gardening guild dedicated to helping the citizens of Triskellian.\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Our Members\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\Trinity\, Healer \& Gardener\
\\r\\n\Corliss\, Healer\
\\r\\n\Lady Antonia\, Merchant \& Gardener\
\\r\\n\Kurtis\, Assistant\
\\r\\n\Omara\, Healer\
\\r\\n\Kenzie\, Midwife \& Healer\
\\r\\n\Etta\, Medic\
\\r\\n\Grell\, Healer\
\\r\\n\Sas\, Healer\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Plants\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\Small Bouquets:\ 20 denarii\
\\r\\n\Medium Bouquets:\ 30 denarii\
\\r\\n\Large Bouquets:\ 40 denarii\
\\r\\n\Cigars:\ 10 denarii\
\\r\\n\Pastes:\ 5 denarii\
\\r\\n\Tea:\ 5 denarii\
\
\\r\\n\\We also make other things upon request.\\\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\Daisies\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
golden\\\r\\n\
pastel pink\\\r\\n\
yellow\\\r\\n\\
\\r\\n\Foxgloves\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
pastel pink\\\r\\n\
yellow\\\r\\n\\
\\r\\n\Lilies\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\

pastel pink\\\r\\n\
purple\\\r\\n\\

\\r\\n\
\Healing\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\Bandages\: 2 denarii per bandage\
\\r\\n\Muscle Relaxer Ointment\: 30 denarii or 5 denarii per use\
\\r\\n\Surgery\: 10 denarii (emergencies aren't charged)\
\\r\\n\Attendance at Events \& Trips\: 100 trade papers or 300 denarii\
\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\With this being said, we would never deny someone healing just because they can't afford it. At the end of the day our job is to make sure each and every one of you are healthy.\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Join Us\\\\r\\n\\\r\\nPlease send a scroll to Trinity with the following information:\
\
\\r\\n\Name:\\
\\r\\n\Skills:\\
\\r\\n\How long have you been in town:\\
\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\I don't require much for those who want to join. My guild is about teaching all those related to gardening and medicine so that we can help our town together!\\
\
\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
